original_title: Les Mille et une perversions de Félicia
overview: Paul and Gabrielle, a young married couple, take in their neighbor's teenage daughter, Felicia, for a few weeks in the summer. It isn't long before the precocious and seductive Felicia sets her sights on the two of them.
tagline: She's More Than A Woman... She's Almost A Goddess!
title: 1001 Perversions of Felicia
